Inferences

Description The initial_state precedes the final state. The transition occurs after the initial_state and before the final state.
Type x-schema stages

Metaphor Program Alias

Metaphors that use this frame:

as Target frame as Source frame
  • CHANGE IS ACQUISITION
  • CHANGE IS LOSS
  • CHANGE OF STATE IS CHANGE OF LOCATION
  • CHANGE OF STATE IS CHANGE OF POSSESSION
  • PREVENTED CHANGE OF STATE IS PREVENTED CHANGE OF LOCATION
